fields.name: Inspiration:
fields.value:
Town of Salem
Defense: Basic Auto-Vest

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Control someone each night into visiting another target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn your controlled target's role.
- Your target is informed they're controlled.
- RB and control immune
- **__Part of the Daily Streak faction__**.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the town lose.
